text: Rahat Khan (19 December 1940 â€“ 28 August 2020) was a Bangladeshi journalist and novelist. He wrote more than 32 novels. He was an editor for The Daily Ittefaq. == Award == He won Bangla Academy Literary Award in 1973 and Ekushey Padak in 1996, by the Government of Bangladesh. == Deid == Khan died on 28 August 2020, in Dhaka at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bangladeshi journalists Category:Bangladeshi novelists
title: Rahat Khan
